attributes.title: CAN YOU GUESS WHAT WE'RE SAYING?
attributes.description: We play Incohearent with our mouths full of food. Can you guess what we're saying?

attributes.title: Wrestling Charades
attributes.description: Can the gang perform charades while being wrestled by a luchador?

attributes.title: Playing Pictionary in MS Paint
attributes.description: We try to play pictionary in a remote call using MS Paint...

attributes.title: Duct Tape Mummy: Who can escape FIRST?
attributes.description: We turn Blaine and Chris into duct tape mummies. Who do you think will escape first?

attributes.title: Pure Chaos in Tabletop Simulator
attributes.description: Jon, Gus, Barb and Chad attempt to play 5-Minute Marvel in Tabletop Simulator...Can they defeat the boss?

attributes.title: Guess Who, but all the Characters are our Coworkers
attributes.description: We play a custom RT game of Guess Who? The Hard Mode twist? No questions about physical appearance!

attributes.title: Friendship Test with Punishments
attributes.description: We test our knowledge about each other and if we get something wrong... we get punished

attributes.title: DRUNK Mount Your Friends
attributes.description: In Today's hard mode we play Mount Your Friends but if anyone falls... everyone drinks

attributes.title: How to play Hide 'N Seek in Quarantine
attributes.description: Chris, Mariel, Blaine, Jessica and Chad are hiding somewhere in their rooms. Can you guess where they are before Jon and Barb do?

attributes.title: Dirty Bingo - Stealing, Flashing & Hook-ups
attributes.description:
Check out our all new podcast! https://link.chtbl.com/BlackBoxDown
The gang plays bingo! The twist? To get a space you have to tell an embarrassing story!

attributes.title: Uncomfortable Guess Who with Geoff and Gavin
attributes.description: Geoff and Gavin join us for another uncomfortable round of Guess Who where we ask uncomfortable questions about our co-workers!

attributes.title: Blindfolded Newspaper Tag
attributes.description:
Disclaimer: This video was recorded before quarantine
We're playing tag in the office! The twist? We're blindfolded and using newspapers to do the tagging! Someone's probably going to get hurt...

attributes.title: Secret Palpatine w/ Achievement Hunter
attributes.description: Michael and Jack from AH join us for some secret Palpatine in Tabletop Simulator and Chris has no idea what he's doing...

attributes.title: "Extreme" Puzzle Racing
attributes.description: We're back in Tabletop Simulator! This time to see who can complete embarrassing picture puzzles the fastest!

attributes.title: Can You Guess Who's Fakin' It?
attributes.description: We're playing Jackbox Fakin' it! Can you tell who's lying?

attributes.title: Pandemic in a Pandemic
attributes.description: We're playing Pandemic in a Pandemic! The twist? With every epidemic / outbreak we have to chug water and put on a blanket!

attributes.title: Playing Codenames with Charades!
attributes.description: We're playing Codenames in Tabletop Simulator, The Twist? You have to mime out the code word!

attributes.title: Uncomfortable Guess Who with Jack & Fiona
attributes.description: We're playing more guess who where we can only ask personal questions about our friends!

attributes.title: Dirty Bingo with Trevor and Ify
attributes.description: Ify and Trevor join us for more Bingo where we have to tell the story to get the space!

attributes.title: The Game of LIFE but with Real Student Debt
attributes.description: Galm joins us to play The Game of Life in Tabletop Simulator! The twist? Everyone starts with their college debt!

attributes.title: Insane Quarantine Hide & Seek Tactic!
attributes.description: It's another round of video call hide and seek! iamBrandon and Blaine compete to try and find Barb, Jessica, Andrew, Chris and Jon who are hiding somewhere in their rooms!

attributes.title: Playing Monikers with Speech Jammers
attributes.description: The gang is playing Monikers in Tabletop Simulator! The twist? The person giving clues is using a speech jammer!

attributes.title: Codenames with Rooster Teeth Cards
attributes.description: Jon, Gus, Mariel and Drew are playing more Codenames, but this time the entire deck is RT references!

attributes.title: Marco Polo in GTA V
attributes.description: We're playing Marco Polo in GTA V! One person is blindfolded and has to use audio only to kill the other players!

attributes.title: Uncomfortable Guess Who: Who'd be the First to Kill?
attributes.description: It's time for more Uncomfortable Guess Who where all the cards are our friends and co-workers and we can only ask questions that judge them!

attributes.title: Painful Musical Chairs
attributes.description: Disclaimer: This video was filmed before quarantine We're playing musical chairs and whoever doesn't make it to a chair has to sit on the pummel horse!

attributes.title: Surgeon Simulator with Random Punishments
attributes.description: Jon, Chris & Blaine try their best in surgeon simulator. The twist? Every time they fail a mission someone gets a random punishment for the next round.

attributes.title: Tiny Hand Challenge
attributes.description: It's Chris VS Barb to see who can accomplish a series of tasks with tiny plastic hands

attributes.title: Eating What Our Characters Eat in Green Hell
attributes.description: We're playing Green Hell but we have to eat everything our characters do!

attributes.title: Flare Gun Hide & Seek in GTA V
attributes.description: Blaine, Chris, Gus & Jon are playing Hide & Seek in GTA V but the hider has to fire a flare into the air every 20 seconds. How long can they last?

attributes.title: Minecraft Dig Down Race
attributes.description: We're breaking the laws of Minecraft and digging straight down. If you make it to bedrock you get a point, if you die you're out!

attributes.title: Left 4 Dead with Chris's Mom
attributes.description: We're playing the Left 4 Dead Last Stand update! The Twist? We have to keep Chris's Mom alive!

attributes.title: Being Forced to Stay Together in Dead by Daylight
attributes.description: It's Dead by Daylight only the group HAS to stay together!

attributes.title: Phasmophobia with NO Flashlights
attributes.description: Jon, Gus and Chris are playing Phasmophobia. The twist? No one can use a flashlight...

attributes.title: Uncomfortable Guess Who: Would this person give us Piggybacks?
attributes.description: We play Guess Who where all the players are our coworkers, and we've got a new board! Watch us argue over what our friends would do, and hope they never watch this.

attributes.title: Cooking and Playing Overcooked at the Same Time!
attributes.description: We're racing to see which team can get the best score in Overcooked 2 while ALSO cooking in real life!

attributes.title: Phasmophobia in Real Life
attributes.description: For Extra Life 2020 we sent Kerry and Cole through a real life Phasmophobia ghost hunt.You can still donate to extra life! Head to http://Donate.RoosterTeeth.com

attributes.title: Spies in Disguise - GTA V
attributes.description: Special Agents Chris and Blaine are tracking down the world's most dangerous terrorists: Barb, Jon and Gus! They could be anyone, and if our agents guess wrong, they still have to take the shot!

attributes.title: The Minecraft White Room
attributes.description: Can the gang survive the white room?

attributes.title: Uncomfortable Guess Who: Would you Date Gavin?
attributes.description: We're playing more Guess Who where we have to ask uncomfortable questions about our co-workers and friends!

attributes.title: Super Smash Bros. in Minecraft!
attributes.description: Jon created Smash Bross in Minecraft and Barb, Gus, Chris and Blaine are going head to head!
